Lettering Assortment

Clockwise from upper left:

  1. Lettering/logo for the travel blog Man Over Board.

  2. Drop cap inspired by Jessica Hische's Penguin Drop Caps and Susanna Clarke's Jonathan Strange and Mr Norrell. There's also a pen and ink version here (with more thistly thistles).

  3. ... Just make something!

  4. A line from Richard Siken's "Scheherazade." Read the poem here.
